concept.title: Significance of Typewriter Formatting
concept.shortdesc: The most important reason for formatting a manual typewriter is to ensure consistent, legible, and properly aligned text while typing.

section.title: Key Reasons to Format a Typewriter

strow.stentry: Consistent margins and spacing create clear, easy-to-read text.
Even alignment prevents crowded or uneven lines on the page.
Structured layout gives documents a neat and organized presentation.
Formatting replaces digital alignment tools by defining physical typing boundaries.
Proper margins and spacing optimize the available writing area.
Margin stops and bell indicators guide the typist and maintain structure.
